Aug. 20, 1898 D Barnsley Contest
Barnsley Contest 0 Other Barnsley Contest [1800s] barnsley-contest
La Favorita [arr. Godfrey]
Tower Field, Park Road, Barnsley Promoted by Barnsley Borough Prize Band Prizes: £8, £5, £3, £2, £1 March contest: 1. Holme, 2. Dodworth Best cornet and horn - Holme Silver. 5 bands competed
Oct. 15, 2012, 1:11 p.m. Jan. 28, 2020, 11:48 a.m.

2 Rotherham Temperance Charles John Elsom

4 Dodworth Colliery MW Brass Fenton Renshaw
